project.name: Low-VOC floor system upgrade
project.description: Upgrade of floor coating system to a lower-VOC, regulation-compliant version.

text_blocks:
I need to check if the current user has permission to pause this project. Looking at the project details:

- Project Lead is `Bhwa_042`
- Current user is `Bhwa_152` with department "External"

The current user (`Bhwa_152`) is:
1. NOT on the project team
2. NOT in Corporate Leadership (department is "External")
3. An external department user

According to the rules, only the project Lead or Corporate Leadership can change project status. External department users have no access to modify project data.

input.message: Access denied. You do not have permission to pause this project. Only the project Lead (Bhwa_042) or Corporate Leadership can change the project status.
